title: Raani Kundan Polki Jhumka: The Blossom Drop
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polishing for lasting shine.
features: Classic Jhumka silhouette adorned with a floral Polki diamond cluster stud. Delicate drops feature Rose Quartz and Emerald beads interspersed with clusters of freshwater pearls, offering a modern twist on traditional design. The Polki setting is handcrafted with intricate detailing, showcasing exceptional Indian craftsmanship.
colors: Cream (Freshwater Pearls). The combination evokes a sense of delicate femininity and regal charm.
occasions: and festive occasions. Also suitable for a modern twist to half-saree functions or cultural celebrations. Perfect for adding a touch of classic elegance to any formal attire.
description: A stunning fusion of tradition and contemporary style. The uncut Polki diamonds exude a timeless aura, while the Rose Quartz and Emeralds add a touch of refreshing modernity. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, this Jhumka is a testament to exquisite Indian jewelry making. Durable and captivating, it's a heirloom piece to be treasured for generations.
